name: Grater
description: A 2D platformer full of riddles, collecting, shooting and frozen time.
minimum_requirements: Processor: Intel i3 or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any non-onboard card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard Additional Notes: Game features a low quality mode that further reduces system requirements.
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel i5 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Almost any non-onboard card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard
